ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM with Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens
Includes: Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens, Transcend 32 GB SDHC Class 10 Flash Memory Card, Ultra High Quality Battery Pack for Canon EOS
Opteka RC-4 Wireless Remote Control for Canon, Opteka OPT540 54" Compact Professional Photo / Video Tripod
Opteka High Definition II UV (0) Ultra Violet Haze Multi-Coated Glass Filter, Opteka High Definition² Professional 5 Piece Filter Kit (UV, CPL, FL, ND4 and 10x Macro Lens), HDMI Cable,
Opteka Microfiber Deluxe Photo/Video Camera Gadget Bag for Digital Cameras & Camcorders, Opteka Digital Camera / Camcorder Lens Cleaning Kit, Tabletop Tripod, & LCD Screen Protectors, Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Photography in Snap DVD, 47 Street Photo Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM Super Kit with Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS II Telephoto Zoom Lens, 32GB Memory Card, Spare Battery, Filters + More!
